author: Debra Kahn
title: It's come to this: Liberal San Francisco Bay Area bans reusable grocery bags
description: The rule appears to be the most stringent coronavirus-related restriction placed on reusable bags in California.
content:
A worker packs a customer's groceries in her reusable bag | Eduardo Munoz Alvarez/Getty Images)
SAN FRANCISCO In the latest sign of how dramatically the coronavirus pandemic is altering the social landscape, even the liberal San Francisco Bay Area this week … [+4536 chars]
